profile.name: Swaathy Kamaraj
profile.tagline: Digital Product Growth | AI-Driven Customer Experience Strategy
profile.summary: Product Manager with 7 years of progressive experience in building, scaling, and optimizing high-traffic B2C digital products across e-commerce and large-scale consumer ecosystems. Proven expertise in leading the end-to-end product strategy for critical storefront touchpoints to drive engagement and revenue. Skilled in applying data, AI-driven insights and A/B experimentation frameworks to deliver high-conversion consumer experiences. Adept at stakeholder alignment, mentoring, and championing a culture of customer obsession and product excellence.

achievements: Led cross-functional teams to define and execute the growth strategy across 25+ global Samsung Shop markets, leveraging funnel analysis on the storefront to boost engagement and increase order completion rate by 9%.
Developed and standardized category-level OKRs and KPI frameworks for device pricing and promotional effectiveness, driving a 12% increase in promotional ROI.
Directed in-depth consumer research that surfaced 10+ actionable market opportunities in discovery flows, generating $5M in annualized incremental revenue.

Partnered with Design, Engineering, and Marketing teams to execute a rigorous A/B testing roadmap across the storefront, focused on high-impact optimizations and personalization for the Home Page, PDP, and Checkout, driving a 13% improvement in conversion funnel performance.
Owned and maintained insight dashboards tracking revenue, traffic quality, and retention, which reduced the product iteration cycle time by 30% via real-time stakeholder alignment.
Cultivated a culture of product excellence by actively mentoring 3+ junior PMs on experimentation best practices, data-driven decision making, and defining scalable features for the storefront.
Improved product adoption by 25% by leveraging in-depth market research and customer journey analysis, demonstrating customer empathy in feature prioritization.

Improved retention and user satisfaction by continuously measuring NPS, tracking task success, and identifying critical drop-off points in the user journey, resulting in a 9% increase in user retention and a 13% NPS improvement.
Drove sprint planning, backlog grooming, and cross-team dependency management, resulting in a 20% improvement in product delivery efficiency.

Collaborated with Engineering and Data Science teams to design and execute intent modeling and predictive analytics features within the CX product portfolio, successfully improving chatbot containment by 27%.
Managed a $12M+ CX product portfolio, focusing on behavioral analytics and automation to reduce customer support load and improve efficiency.
Led A/B experiments on conversation design and UX structure to improve CSAT and retention, fostering a culture of rapid prototyping and continuous improvement.
Gathered and translated business requirements into feature specifications for internal and client-facing tools, resulting in 16% improvement in project delivery efficiency.
Mapped end-to-end product workflows and identified process gaps, resulting in improved user efficiency by 11% and enhanced overall user experience.
Created functional documentation, wireframes, and acceptance criteria for engineering teams.
Conducted UAT cycles, validating feature functionality before production release.
Supported project managers in tracking progress, stakeholder collaboration, and delivery governance.

education.degree: M.Tech – AI & ML (Work Integrated Learning Program)
